Text: Thanks. This is supposed to be in French language so I assume it is dubbed in Spanish

is there any way to get this without the subs so that i can put english subs on? it seems i could just watch this without the subs and be happy but the spanish subs are a little distracting. would be extremely appreciated!
Would greatly appreciate this without the spanish subs and including an english.srt :) But I agree with below, it seems I would be happy with just soaking in the imagery.
